name: Audiobookshelf
description: Audiobookshelf is a self-hosted audiobook server for managing and listening to your audiobooks.

apps.name: Audiobookshelf
apps.localizedDescription: Audiobookshelf is a self-hosted audiobook server for managing and listening to your audiobooks.

versions.localizedDescription:
Fixed
• Playing audiobook from collection uses local media if available
• UI/UX: Cover images now show for servers older than v2.17.0
• (Android) Crash when downloading media using server older than v2.17.0 1450
• (Android) Android Auto functions being requested when not using android auto 1446
• (Android) End of Chapter Sleep Timer not respecting playback speed 1399 by @nichwall in 1453
• (Android) Auto Sleep Timer starting outside of time window 1268 by @nichwall in 1453

Updated
• UI/UX: Missing items show missing indicator on cover and on item page
• UI/UX: Playlists/collections play button shows pause when item is playing 1394
• UI/UX: Podcast episodes default sort order is based on podcast type ("serial" is pub date ascending) by @anstosa in 1455
• UI/UX: Support rich text descriptions (coming in next server release) 1281
• (Android) Disabling Auto Sleep Timer now only disables for that day 1200 by @nichwall in 1453
• More strings translated
  • Chinese (Simplified Han script) by @springsunx
  • Croatian by @biuklija @milotype
  • Czech by @Losicek
  • Danish by @ZombieSmurf @MorellReng
  • German by @Vito0912 @RaHoni @TheBinaryLoop @akynr
  • Hungarian by @ugyes
  • Norwegian Bokmål by @PSchaug
  • Slovenian by @thehijacker
  • Spanish by @nothingbutlucas
  • Swedish by @Cotignac

New Contributors
* @anstosa made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/1455

Full Changelog: https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/compare/v0.9.78•beta...v0.9.79•beta

Requires server v2.17.0 and up for images to load

Added
• Epub ereader setting to allow volume keys to navigate while playing 1365 by @RaHoni in 1383
• Epub ereader setting to keep screen awake 1207
• Bengali and Slovenian language options
• Catalan language option by @jaumet in 1407
• (Android) Better Android Auto library browsing 1204 by @ISO•B in 1322

Fixed
• UI/UX: Epub ereader settings overflow not scrollable 1374

Updated
• UI/UX: Podcast items show num episodes incomplete in library tab
• UI/UX: Create bookmark auto focuses input and selects placeholder text
• UI/UX: Bookmark timestamps are relative to playback speed 1148
• UI/UX: Bookmark create button is sticky to the bottom of modal 1413
• UI/UX: Show warning message for server connections using old user id 1411
• UI/UX: Format numbers w/ localization 1427
• UI/UX: Sync error icon on audio player cover image shows alert message on tap 1396
• Support subdirectory in server address (coming soon in server) by @mikiher in 1417
• More strings localized 1375
• (Android) Downloads request raw cover image (for best quality) 1328
• Strings translated
  • Arabic by @Terminal•Grasshopper
  • Belarusian by @i•Nosferatu•i
  • Bengali by @soaibsafi
  • Bulgarian by @i•Nosferatu•i
  • Catalan by @martinezpenya
  • Chinese (Simplified Han script) by @springsunx @Tamanegii
  • Chinese (Traditional Han script) by @Tamanegii
  • Croatian by @biuklija @milotype
  • Czech by @vachekcz @Plazec
  • Danish by @WiredMic
  • Dutch by @matieke
  • French by @isogashiiman
  • German by @Vito0912
  • Hebrew by @mnavon
  • Hungarian by @ugyes
  • Italian by @burghy86
  • Lithuanian by @pranelio
  • Portuguese (Brazil) by @paulohenriquesg
  • Russian by @Nab0y
  • Slovenian by @thehijacker
  • Spanish by @gallegonovato
  • Swedish by @Cotignac

Internal
• Update to Capacitor 6

New Contributors
* @jaumet made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/1407
* @mikiher made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/1417

Full Changelog: https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/compare/v0.9.77•beta...v0.9.78•beta

Added
• Random library sort option 1285

Fixed
• (Android) Crash on starting stream

Updated
• Strings translated
  • Swedish by @Landrash

Full Changelog: https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/compare/f405947...8bc5932

Added
• Links to web client on item pages and side nav by @nichwall in 1079
• "No Series" filter for book libraries 1184
• Explicit indicator next to titles 1181
• Ukrainian translations by @cor•bee in 1136
• Vietnamese translations by @nichwall in 1127

Fixed
• Remove from playlist in context menu 987
• UI/UX: Closing sleep timer modal when custom timer sub modal is open 1112
• UI/UX: Podcast library playlists page shows incorrect label in toolbar 1135
• (Android) Client version passed in listening sessions
• (Android) Cover image in notification being resized 657
• (iOS) Certain headphones can't pause when playback speed is above 1x 1177 by @indiefan in 1178
• (iOS) Pause not working after updating settings 1141 by @indiefan in 1205

Updated
• Include 1.7x playback speed in modal 1180
• Support for comic files with webp images
• (iOS) Refactor AudioPlayer to use a Rate Manager protocol by @indiefan in 1179
• Strings translated
  • Vietnamese by @nichwall in 1127
  • Ukrainian by @cor•bee in 1136 1140 1206
  • Portuguese (Brazil) by @pmangro in 1139 1160
  • Italian by @burghy86 in 1153
  • Simplified Chinese by @springsunx in 1162
  • French by @Fymyte in 1176

Internal
• Github workflow for i18n strings by @nichwall in 1142 1174
• Github issue templates by @nichwall in 1199 1201
• Readme: Translation guide link added by @nichwall in 1150

New Contributors
* @nichwall made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/1127
* @cor•bee made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/1136
* @springsunx made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/1162
* @Fymyte made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/1176
* @indiefan made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/1178

Full Changelog: https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/compare/v0.9.73•beta...v0.9.74•beta

Added
• Setting to enable/disable seeking on media notification controls 526 by @fidoriel in 1094
• Remove from playlist option in context menu of media items on playlist page 987
• Portuguese (Brazil) translations by @pmangro in 1095
• Hungarian translations by @megamegax in 1109

Fixed
• Local media item page long titles overflowing screen pushing play & more menu button offscreen 1103
• Swiping with modal open minimizes/expands audio player 1099
• Progress bar overflowing edge of screen on orientation changes
• Playlist tab not shown after adding first playlist 1092
• (Android) Android auto not connecting to server, only showing downloads 1081

Updated
• Seeking in media notification controls is disabled by default
• Strings translated
  • Czech by @arcao in 1082
  • Hungarian by @megamegax in 1109
  • Portuguese (Brazil) by @pmangro in 1095 1106

New Contributors
* @arcao made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/1082
* @pmangro made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/1095
* @fidoriel made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/1094
* @megamegax made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/1109

Full Changelog: https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/compare/v0.9.72•beta...v0.9.73•beta

Added
• Player setting to toggle scaling elapsed time by playback speed 1028

Fixed
• Continue listening shelves for local media not being shown on first connection attempt 1038
• Settings page toggle touch area 1021
• No response when clicking on media item after losing server connection
• Library list still showing in app bar with no network connection
• Device info not being reported for fully offline listening sessions
• (iOS) Reporting 0 second listening sessions 970
• (Android) Crash on startup due to SimpleStorage 1040
• (Android) Still sending server sync requests when in offline mode (after pressing "Disconnect")

Updated
• Audio player title scrolls when text overflows 740
• Minimized player shows title and current chapter title 740
• Swiping down anywhere on fullscreen audio player closes it 1046
• Swiping up on minimized audio player opens it 1046
• Authors page cards size increased to show 2 per row 1026
• (iOS) After app is suspended audio is not resumed (fix attempt for 973)
• Strings translated
  • German by @bloodscript in 1052
  • Italian by @burghy86 in 1032
  • Polish by @Bogumio in 1042 1049

New Contributors
* @Bogumio made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/1042
* @bloodscript made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/1052

Full Changelog: https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/compare/v0.9.71•beta...v0.9.72•beta

Added
• Year in review stats images to user stats page (Requires server v2.7.1+)
• Epub ereader setting to use single page layout for tablets 1018
• Tags to item page 1014

Fixed
• Spacing for comma separated links on items page 1020
• Library list view long titles causing overflow 1013
• Download indicator overlapping series sequence on book covers 996
• Filter dialog clear button overflowing notch 999
• (iOS) Play/pause with specific headphones/speakers 622 by @benonymity @KaiStarkk in 1005 1016
• (iOS) (partial fix) Swipe back in fullscreen audio player by @benonymity in 1003

Updated
• Comma separated links on item page can wrap to multiple lines
• Background color gradient on item page to absolute position
• (iOS) Now playing widget respects chapter track setting in audio player 239 @ronaldheft @benonymity in 1002
• (iOS) Status bar changes color to match the full screen audio player background by @benonymity in 1004
• Strings translated
  • German by @Hallo951 in 991
  • Simplified Chinese by @Jafeyyu in 997 1007

New Contributors
* @KaiStarkk made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/1016

Full Changelog: https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/compare/v0.9.69•beta...v0.9.71•beta

Added
• Podcast episode filter for downloaded episodes
• (Android) Monochrome app icon 786

Fixed
• Redirecting to server item copy from local copy when there is no network connection 958
• Opening local item that was downloaded on server v2.2.23 or earlier but are now on a more recent server version 953
• Downloaded item alert for user mismatch when server connection is storing an old user id 945
• Podcast page more menu button not working when at least 1 episode is downloaded
• OIDC login button (for upcoming server release)
• (Android) Android auto unable to play podcast episodes 832

Updated
• Navigating to podcast from the local podcast home page shelf will auto filter by downloaded episodes 958

Full Changelog: https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/compare/v0.9.67•beta...v0.9.68•beta

Added
• Support for oauth2 (preparing for upcoming server release) by @Sapd in 906
• Send ebook to device 909
• Tags shown in search results 940

Fixed
• 404 when clicking on collapsed series item in list view 877
• Series page sorting by name 925
• (iOS) Sleep timer stopping after player interaction 477 by @atoghyani in 887
• (iOS) Progress not being saved for downloads 825
• (Android) Downloading finished media item not being marked as finished 903
• (Android) Seeking in notification player resetting progress 894

Updated
• Server connection form: Server address no longer requires protocol & improved error messaging by @Sapd in 906
• Library item page for local downloads shows alerts if the current connected server does not match
• Podcast search page renamed to "Add" 936
• Bookmarks modal is no longer closed after updating/deleting 882
• Playlist table row items include progress bar & more context menu 914
• Collection table does not show duration for ebooks
• Making native http requests instead of webview fetch requests to resolve CORS issues 781
• Server connect page shows message to new users that an Audiobookshelf server is required 912
• (iOS) Sync local sessions using new sync all api endpoint (fixes https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf/issues/2294)
• (iOS) Removed background task syncing with server when media is paused
• (Android) Removed scanning options for local downloads and ffmpegkit dependency

New Contributors
* @Sapd made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/906
* @atoghyani made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/887

Full Changelog: https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/compare/v0.9.66•beta...v0.9.67•beta

Added
• .ipa for sideloading on iOS (included in release assets) 837

Fixed
• Comma separated lists space before comma 777 by @casrou in 813
• Separator between authors by @lkiesow in 851
• Comic reader incorrect file sort order when file number is more than 5•digits
• Progress lost when app is in background for extended period 828
• Clicking title on fullscreen audio player redirects to item page but doesnt change library 803
• Epub ereader incorrect line•height on titles causing overlap 874
• Epub ereader swiping sometimes moving 2 pages (partial fix) 802
• (Android) Sync server progress to local progress 808
• (Android) Internal storage downloads triggering multiple times 791
• (Android) Offline playback sessions continuing to sync creating duplicates on the server
• (Android) Android auto loading podcast episodes 832
• (Android) Mp3 index seeking setting not persisting 638

Updated
• Making native http requests instead of webview fetch requests to resolve CORS issues 781
• Initial server connection no longer blocks app usage
• Podcast covers show number of episodes incomplete instead of total episodes 315
• Local sessions are synced on network reconnections
• Add "Switch Server/User" button in side drawer and account page 628
• Renamed "Logout" to "Disconnect" in side drawer (does not redirect, just goes in offline•mode) 628
• Epub ereader shows location in the bottom left 766
• Bookmarks modal UI/UX 876
• (iOS) Removed lock orientation setting because it's not supported on iOS webview
• (Android) Android auto includes explicit indicator 611

New Contributors
* @casrou made their first contribution in https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/pull/813

Full Changelog: https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf•app/compare/v0.9.65•beta...v0.9.66•beta
